mapper.insert: insert into company(comName, sinaWeibo, tencentWeibo, url, contactor, contactTel, email, comPicture, comHonor, remark, creator, createTime, modifier, modifyTime, officeId) VALUES (#{comName}, #{sinaWeibo}, #{tencentWeibo}, #{url}, #{contactor}, #{contactTel}, #{email}, #{comPicture}, #{comHonor}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{officeId})
